info.name: TurkTicaret API Collection
info.description: TurkTicaret API Collection for interacting with the TurkTicaret backend services

item.name: Authentication
item.description: Authentication endpoints for login and registration

request.description: Register a new user account
request.name: Register

request.description: Login with email and password to get authentication token
request.name: Login

request.description: Get the authenticated user's profile information
request.name: Get Profile

request.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information
request.name: Update Profile

item.description: Category management endpoints with full CRUD operations

request.name: List Categories

request.description: Create a new category

request.name: Force Delete Category

request.description: Get all active categories
request.name: Filter by Status - Active

request.description: Get all inactive categories

request.description: Get categories sorted by creation date (newest first)
request.name: Sort by Created Date DESC

item.name: Products
item.description: Product management endpoints with full CRUD operations and soft deletes

query.description: Search in name, description, and SKU

request.description: Retrieve paginated list of products with filtering options
request.name: List Products

body.raw:
{
  "name": "iPhone 15 Pro",
  "description": "Latest iPhone model with advanced features",
  "sku": "IPH-15-PRO-001",
  "price": 129900,
  "stock_quantity": 50,
  "image_path": "/images/products/iphone-15-pro.jpg",
  "is_active": true,
  "category_uuid": "{{category_uuid}}"
}

request.description: Create a new product
request.name: Create Product

request.description: Get a specific product by UUID
request.name: Get Product

body.raw:
{
  "name": "iPhone 15 Pro Updated",
  "description": "Updated description for iPhone 15 Pro",
  "price": 119900,
  "stock_quantity": 75,
  "is_active": true
}

request.description: Update a specific product
request.name: Update Product

request.description: Soft delete a specific product
request.name: Delete Product (Soft Delete)

request.description: Restore a soft deleted product
request.name: Restore Product

request.description: Permanently delete a product
request.name: Force Delete Product

request.description: Get products from a specific category
request.name: Filter by Category

request.description: Get all active products
request.name: Filter by Active Status

request.description: Get products within price range
request.name: Filter by Price Range

query.description: Search in name, description, and SKU

request.description: Search products by name, description, or SKU
request.name: Search Products

request.description: Get products sorted by price (low to high)
request.name: Sort by Price ASC

request.description: Get products sorted by name (Z-A)
request.name: Sort by Name DESC

request.description: Get products with low stock (10 items)
request.name: Low Stock Products

request.description: Multiple filters combined: category, active, price range, search, sorted
request.name: Combined Filters

item.name: Cart
item.description: Shopping cart management endpoints for authenticated users

request.description: View current user's shopping cart with all items and totals
request.name: View Cart

request.description: Add a product to the shopping cart or increase quantity if already exists
request.name: Add to Cart

request.description: Update the quantity of a specific product in the cart
request.name: Update Cart Item

request.description: Remove a specific product from the shopping cart
request.name: Remove from Cart

request.description: Remove all items from the shopping cart
request.name: Clear Cart

request.description: Add first product to cart
request.name: Add Multiple Items

request.description: Add same product again - should increase quantity to 4 total
request.name: Add Same Product Again

request.description: Set quantity to exactly 10 items
request.name: Update Quantity to Specific Amount

request.description: Verify cart contents and total amount
request.name: Check Cart Total

request.description: Try to add product with invalid UUID - should fail
request.name: Add Invalid Product

request.description: Try to add 0 quantity - should fail validation
request.name: Add Zero Quantity

request.description: Try to add more than 100 items - should fail validation
request.name: Add Excessive Quantity

request.description: Try to remove product that's not in cart
request.name: Remove Non-existent Product

item.name: Orders
item.description: Order management endpoints for creating and viewing orders

request.description: Create a new order from current user's cart items
request.name: Create Order from Cart

request.description: Get all orders for the authenticated user with pagination
request.name: Get User Orders

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific order
request.name: Get Order Details

item.name: Order Workflow
item.description: Complete order workflow from cart to order creation

request.description: Step 1: Add products to cart
request.name: 1. Add Items to Cart

request.description: Step 2: Review cart contents before ordering
request.name: 2. Review Cart

request.description: Step 3: Create order from cart items
request.name: 3. Create Order

request.description: Step 4: Verify cart is cleared after order creation
request.name: 4. Verify Empty Cart

request.description: Step 5: View the newly created order details
request.name: 5. View Created Order

request.description: Try to create order when cart is empty - should fail
request.name: Create Order with Empty Cart

request.description: Try to create order without shipping address - should fail validation
request.name: Create Order without Shipping Address

request.description: Try to create order with very short address - should fail validation
request.name: Create Order with Short Address

request.description: Try to access order that doesn't belong to current user - should be forbidden
request.name: Access Another User's Order
